body:
Put your most clutch moments down below! I have two. 

1. About a year ago on nebula, I was rushing on Quintus. The other team had broken 4/5 monuments and we had 0/5. Then in some sort of miracle our team had 4 players (including me) break all 5 monuments in under 30 seconds to clutch a win. We weren't even communicating, we just decided to all rush at once. 

2. Today on walls I was playing on Grotto Area. If you didn't know, you trade emeralds for enchanted diamond armor and potions on that map. It takes a long time to kill people also. During the game, everyone died until it was me vs 3 other players on one team. They were decent pvpers and the fight lasted for what felt like 10 minutes (each player had a few potions of complete health restoration). I almost broke 2 diamond helmets fighting, but I managed to somehow pick off players at the end of the fight and win the 3v1 and come out on top

title: What was your most clutch moment?

replies.body:
Ended old Frosbite in less than 10 mins, Getting about a thousand mons 4 secs after or before someone else broke it, I had full dia, got hit off, and literally MLG block placed on the last block, lots of MLG block placing happening on Ternio, get a monument with about 5 people following me, then killing them all, and dying.

lol

replies.body:
Server was lagging

It was a halcyon match. I mine the monument and it broke but I died before I fully broke it so it respawned 5 mins later it says I break it

It was a halcyon match. I mine the monument and it broke but I died before I fully broke it so it respawned 5 mins later it says I break it

replies.body: My most clutch moment was when I got over 60 kills on Justice I , and broke both monuments. It was a great day.
replies.body_tagged: My most clutch moment was when I got over 60 kills on Justice I , and broke both monuments. It was a great day.

replies.body:
It was a very long match on Quintus, and each team had 4 out of 5 monuments broken. Our defense was under heavy attacked, so I knew it was now or never. I made my iron quick, and dashed right to the back of their spawn. I broke the back wall, and this guy came and hit me. He got so much knockback that I hit the monument island, and then looked down and place a block, saving me from the void. I pillared up, killed a full diamond and full iron, and broke the monument just as they reached the island, and I saw our last defender die in chat. 


Best. Game. Ever.
replies.body_tagged:

Best. Game. Ever.

replies.body: A long time ago when I was playing on quintus I was rushing and at the time I did not know what monument was broken as I was a noob so I bridged to every monument  and tried to see if it was broken and on a couple of them someone decided to place the broken obsidian back which made it take forty minutes or so until I finally got the unbroken monument and I broke it just before someone killed me.

replies.body:
Getting KF'd on Quintus and getting a Penta Monument In two runs. :) 

Or when I was bridging, (ninja, so I was facing diagonally) and I got shot once and in mid-air placed a block off my 1-wide bridge to save myself 3 times in a row, same bridge. Idek how xP

replies.body: It was a game on senex I (good map) and the game had been going on for a long time. And i sneaked passed the whole team to find the monument protected by about 10 people. I didn't know what I would do. But then I saw a chest and there was some lime armor and I was on the blue team. So I took that armor and swapped it with mine. Then slowly made my way to the monument while pressing shift. And when someone came passed I just pretended I was building the bridge better.. Then when I got to the monument. Surprisingly nobody reconized that I was on the opposite team. So I waited till nobody was watching to quickly break the monument with about 10 guys all around me. Then we won the game and they were trippin ballz

As a lot of you know, I am bad at PvP due to having a laptop, so this was my best moment.

It was Zao, about 4 months ago. I was rushing and 7 people were all trying to snipe near the void area, and I just went up and killed all of them, and I don't know how I did. That match ended up being 64-11, my best ever. Normally my matches are like 2-9999

replies.body: MilkshakesMC were playing a round of UHC. He said he was going to get something so he will be back in a minute so he left the game. So I was alone smelting my gold and suddenly there was a team of two right there after me. I killed one player but the other player got down to two hearts. Suddenly that other guy's mouse spun by accident and his head spinned away from me. Then a managed to kill him. And after deathmatch we both won. :)

replies.body: I was playing Luar and the match was nearing on 30 minutes. There were many campers at their defense, and I quietly found some of the other team's armor in a chest. I then built behind the monument, then built up above it from behind. I then jumped on the monument, and quietly destroyed it. The guys below me had no idea what had happened. There I felt the true feeling of victory
